project_name: Quantum Voice AI – QR-to-Call Lead Agent
problem: Small teams miss calls and leads, especially from offline traffic like flyers, signs, and packaging.
solution: A QR-to-call voice agent that captures leads 24/7, asks smart qualifying questions, and pushes structured data into CRMs/tasks.
primary_user: Business owner or marketer who wants leads without managing complex phone systems.
core_features: Dynamic QR codes pointing to a branded call page
Browser-based voice call with AI receptionist
Lead capture (name, contact, intent, budget, timing)
Auto-creation of Asana tasks and email summaries
Basic analytics on calls and conversions

mvp_journey.entry: User scans QR from sign, flyer, or screen
steps: Landing page loads with short pitch and Call button
User joins voice call with AI agent via LiveKit
AI greets, explains role, and asks qualifying questions
AI confirms details and thanks caller
System sends email summary and creates Asana task
mvp_journey.exit: Lead is stored, team has clear follow-up items

business_model.unit: minutes of AI talk time + number of active campaigns
business_model.target_niche: high-intent local services + real estate first

constraints.builder_profile: Vibe coders and Pro builders using AI tools
constraints.budget_sensitivity: Optimize for cheap but good-enough models
constraints.timeline: MVP within 2–4 weeks for a solo builder
constraints.regulatory: Basic consent logging for call summaries
